metadata.name: Process Launched Without Image Name
metadata.comment: Detect the use of processes with no name (".exe"), which can be used to evade Image-based detections.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\.exe')))

output.summary: Detect the use of processes with no name (".exe"), which can be used to evade Image-based detections.

metadata.objective: False positive: Rare legitimate software. Reference: https://www.huntress.com/blog/fake-browser-updates-lead-to-boinc-volunteer-computing-software
